variant.value: Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe buhindagurika/uburangwa n'amarangamutima yo hejuru cyane
Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe burangwa n'imyitwarire itandukira
Depression due to other medical condition
Agahinda gakabije gaturutse ku burwayi bw'umubiri
Agahinda gakabije gafite ibimenyetso byo mu mutwe byeruye
Kudakura mu bwenge/Ubumuga bwo mu mutwe
Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bushingiye ku mbamutima

Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bweruye bwatewe n'ikibazo cy'uburwayi bw'umubiri
Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bweruye bukomeye
Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bweruye bushingiye kumbamutima
Uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bugaragazwa n'ibimenyetso ku mubiri
Reason for stopping and End Date
Impamvu uburwayi bwahindutse cg bwakize(Gushira kw’ibimenyetso,Uburwayi butari bwo) n'igihe/itariki uburwayi bwahindukiye cg bwakiriye
